entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
